title: Problem with 91.0 Update. Consecutive Images fail to load.
content:
Since the update 91.0 (x32bit or x64bit) the image slide-shows from different parts of the browser page for Ebay sites fails to load. I have x64bit Win7 OS. This is a problem with all Ebay sites in Firefox but not Chrome.

I have found other commercial sites using a similar image routine are OK.

The attached image from the site below is an example https://www.ebay.com.au/itm/293954988637?hash=item4471152a5d:g:BocAAOSwvN5gUa51 I cannot move through the available images indicated.

Otherwise I have no other problem with 91.0

Kind Regards Simon
creator: malandjess

title: FF started display popup ad messages in lower right area of browser screen
content: Been a continuous user of FF since the beginning. Recently (most recent few weeks) FF has started issuing popup notices in the lower right hand portion of the browser screen. These only occur when FF is loaded and active. How can I tell which, if any, extensions might be responsible so I can resolve and stop these annoying messages? I've tried trying to determine how and why myself without success. Any suggestions - thank you.
creator: bobmct

title: after last update, my bookmarks dissappeared from left side of screen. I can not find how to replace them - can someon help
content: after last update, my bookmarks dissapeared from left side of screen. I can not find how to replace them - can someone help
